channel.title: EndoScape!
channel.description:
[u][b]Endo-Scape Client-V2[/b][/u]
Hello guys! The day has finally arrived! Endo-Scape's Client V2 is here!!!
[b]Its amazing features:[/b]
[ul][li]100% FULL working prayer!![/li] [li]100% FULL working Special's[/li] [li]100% FULL working Magic[/li] [li]100% FULL working Range [/li] [li]100% FULL working Meele [/li] [li]100% FULL working Vengence Pest Control, Fight Pits, God Wars, Kbd Lair & Etc.[/li] [li]100% FULL working Pking Skulls![/li] [li]100% FULL working music-player![/li] [li]All famous npc's!![/li] [li]100% ALL silabsoft items[/li] [li]No nulled items[/li][/ul]
To ensure that the client has the newest models released, the client automatically updates every model during client-runtime!!! That means you will NEVER have nulled items!!!!!!!
[b]Pictures[/b] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2py2tj5.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2jer5s7.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/ruoa9s.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/34xq0zp.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2cpyqt1.png[/img]
[b]Download[/b] Uppit download: http://uppit.com/v/KC58E3RY
[b]Credits[/b] 30% - Rockhard client (for base) 70% - me (for all the [b]major[/b] editing and glitch-fixing)

item.title: EndoScape!
item.dc:creator: @allstarscape1 allstarscape1
item.description:
@allstarscape1 wrote:

wow, im taking that this client is fake cuz noone is telling me why it sais “error connecting to server” when u try to log in…

if u actually told me i wud consider this client real and then i cud give u a 6/10 or something…

Read full topic

item.title: EndoScape!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

dragonchain:

Wow, are you fucking serious? Putting up a client download that links to your server is fucking advertising. Just putting up a client linking to 127.0.0.1 would be a normal download.

Shut up omfg…

@ontopic
7/10 Nice client but i like mine xD!

Georgio

Read full topic

item.title: EndoScape!
item.dc:creator: @XXXdeathXX XXXdeathXX
item.description:
@XXXdeathXX wrote:

When I said that, I meant the client-sided part of all of that. It sends the correct packets for everything, depending on which item is used.

Read full topic

item.title: EndoScape!
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Well looking at this

* 100% FULL working prayer!! * 100% FULL working Special's * 100% FULL working Magic * 100% FULL working Range * 100% FULL working Meele * 100% FULL working Vengence Pest Control, Fight Pits, God Wars, Kbd Lair & Etc. * 100% FULL working Pking Skulls! * 100% FULL working music-player! * All famous npc's!! * 100% ALL silabsoft items * No nulled items

It obviously looks like you are talking about your server not your client.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @XXXdeathXX XXXdeathXX
item.description:
@XXXdeathXX wrote:

This does not link to my server in any way. If you’d look at the pictures, you’d see that it has a “Server IP” option for you to enter your own IP.

Hello guys! The day has finally arrived! Endo-Scape’s Client V2 is here!!!

Its amazing features:
